title: Bit from Integration With Telegram
description: Telegram is a cloud-based messaging solution. You can message anyone who is registered on the Telegram platform. With the help of Telegram integration with Bit Form users can send photos, videos, and any other files to a specific channel in the telegram group. This new feature provides a seamless experience, allowing you to boost your leads with ease.
